name: HIVESWAP: Act 2
description:
Joey Claire is stranded on a planet of alien teenagers, armed with her best dancin' shoes and a sylladex full of pogs. It’s up to her to survive on the dangerous planet of Alternia and get home with the help of her new friend Xefros, a novice at telekinesis and a fairly decent rapper. The journey ahead requires social skills, puzzle-solving and creative exploration of this richly-imagined planet!

Hiveswap: Act 2 is the anticipated second entry in the four-part series of narrative adventure games from the universe of Andrew Hussie's smash hit webcomic Homestuck. Hiveswap has something for you, whether you're a dedicated fan or just now discovering the fandom phenomenon.
Joey and Xefros's adventure blows up with higher stakes than ever. Can you point, click, talk and solve your way to the end? Find out!

THE DREAM OF THE 90'S IS ALIVE ON ALTERNIA
The artistry and humor of the golden age of adventure games meets full animation and colorful high definition graphics in this love letter to the point-and-click classics. Bizarre alien landscapes and colorful characters make Alternia a joy to explore – if you're clever enough to survive its most murderous residents!

EXPERIENCE BRUTAL REPRESSION
Alternia suffers under the extremely stylish heel of the heiress, Trizza Tethis, and you're on the run from her trail of destruction on the back of a graceful deercat. But there's a resistance that needs your help! Meet and talk to dozens of iconic troll characters from the Hiveswap Friendsim series of visual novels, ranging from the weirdly friendly to the murderous.

THE SWEET SOUNDS OF CLOWNSTEP
James Roach and Toby Fox (creator of Undertale) return for another genre-spanning original soundtrack. Bombastic orchestral arrangements, hip-hop and the pioneering new genre of clownstep score your adventure across this strange alien planet.

Act 2 continues the story begun in Hiveswap: Act 1. Need to catch up on the story?
